title: Leading bar soap brands ranked by sales value in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2014
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million GBP for 3 number of Soap Bar Brands.
The maximum Sales in million GBP 26.8 is found at Soap Bar Brand Dove and the minimum is found at Simple where Soap Bar Brand is 5.8.
The highest Soap Bar Brand Dove has 21.0 more Sales in million GBP than the lowest Soap Bar Brand Simple.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million GBP for 3 number of Soap Bar Brands.
Soap Bar Brand Dove has the highest Sales in million GBP and Simple has the lowest Sales in million GBP.
Second maximum Sales in million GBP is found at Soap Bar Brand .
